yob 10 onlayin bayibalaya | nawa lowa pariwarthanaya yob 10:1-22 10 “mata mage jiwithaya thiththa wi atha.+daragatha nohaki wedanawakin mama katha karannemi.hadawathe dawena duka mama nosangawa prakasha karannemi. 2 ‘ane, ma dushtayek lesa ganan noganna’ kiya mama dewita kiyannemi.‘ma samanga wada karanne manda kiya mata kiyanna. 3 mata pida kirimen oba sathutak labannehida?+obema ath deken nirmanaya kala de+ prathikshepa karamin,dushtayange salasumwalata anubala denne ayi kiya mata kiyanna. 4 obe das+ manushyayange das ha samanada?oba dewal dakinne manushyayan dakina aakarayatada?+ 5 obe jiwithaye dawas duwili wani wu manushyayange jiwithaye dawas ha samanada?+obe awurudu manushyayange awurudu ha samanada? 6 oba nitharama mage waradi soyanne ee nisada?oba samawitama ma athin papayak sidu wi addayi soya balanne manda?+ 7 ma dushtayeku nowana bawa oba sthira washayenma dannehiya.+obe athin mawa galawaganimata kisiweku nathi bawa+ dana danath oba elesa kriya karanne manda? 8 oba kisi aduwak nomathiwa obagema dathin mawa saduwehiya.+enamuth obama mawa nathi kara damanna dan piyawara gena atha. 9 ane, oba mawa saduwe matiwalin+ bawa sihi karanna.oba yali mawa duwillatama harawannehiya.+ 10 oba mawa kiri men wath kara,keju men wimata salaswuwehiya.+ 11 oba ata saha naharawalin mawa sakasa,mansawalinda samenda mawa wasuwehiya.+ 12 oba mata jiwithaya laba di karunawen* mata salakuwehiya.+mage husma poda rakuneth oba nisamaya.+ 13 eheth obe hadawathe yamak sangawi thibina.oba ma pita me siyalla gena enna sithagena siti bawa mama danimi. 14 ma paw kala nam eya oba dakinu atha.+ma waradikaruweku nam oba mata samawa nodenu atha.+ 15 ma waradikaruweku nam mata napurak sidu wiya yuthuya.+ma thula waradak nathathduk pida ha ninda+ nisa mage hisa osawanna mata nohakiya.+ 16 ma udangu+ lesa mage hisa osawanne nam oba sinhayeku men ma pasupasa awith,+mata wiruddhawa obe wikramanwitha balaya penwanu atha. 17 oba mata wiruddhawa thawa thawath sakshikaruwan kandawanu atha.oba ma samanga thawa thawath udahas wi,karadara eka pita eka ma wetha pamunuwanu atha. 18 oba mawa mawkusen pitathata gaththe manda?+ese nokala nam mata kisiwekuge dasata nopeni yannata thibina. 19 ewita melowa eliya nodaka mawkusen mini walata yannata thibina. 20 ma jiwath wanne thawa keti kalakata noweyida?+ esenam mata nidahase sitimata ida dena men illami.ma desa obe neth yomu nokaranna.
